layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

questions.text: I recognize that my relationship with God is MY responsibility — no pastor, spouse, or program can do my spiritual work for me.
When my spiritual life feels dry, I look at my own choices and habits first rather than blaming circumstances or others.
I own that creating time and space for God is my job — I don't wait for the 'right conditions' to appear.
questions.principle: If it's to be, it's up to me

questions.text: I don't blame my upbringing, church experience, or busy schedule for the current state of my spiritual life.
I recognize that spiritual growth requires my active participation — God won't force-feed me what I refuse to receive.
